  • Constructor Details

    • JDBCUserManager

      public JDBCUserManager(ConnectionManager cManager)
      Manages the user-related operations using a JDBC connection. Uses an instance of ConnectionManager to interact with the SQLite database.
      Parameters:
      cManager - The ConnectionManager instance used for database operations.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public void addUser(User user)
      Inserts a new user into the "User" table in the database. The user's username, password (hashed), and role are stored.
      Specified by:
      addUser in interface UserManager
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the user's details (username, password, role).
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error during the SQL operation.

    • verifyUsername

      public boolean verifyUsername(String username, String role)
      Verifies if a given username already exists in the "User" table.
      Specified by:
      verifyUsername in interface UserManager
      Parameters:
      username - The username to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the username exists in the database, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error during the SQL query execution.

    • verifyPassword

      public boolean verifyPassword(String username, String passwordIntroduced)
      Verifies if the provided password matches the stored hashed password for a given username. The password is hashed using the MD5 algorithm and compared to the stored hash.
      Specified by:
      verifyPassword in interface UserManager
      Parameters:
      username - The username to be verified.
      passwordIntroduced - The plaintext password input by the user.
      Returns:
      true if the password matches, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error during the SQL query execution.
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the MD5 hashing algorithm is not found.

    • getUser

      public User getUser(int id)
      Retrieves a User object from the "User" table using the specified user ID.
      Specified by:
      getUser in interface UserManager
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The User object containing the user's details, or null if no user is found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error during the SQL query execution.

    • getId

      public int getId(String username)
      Retrieves the ID of a user based on the provided username.
      Specified by:
      getId in interface UserManager
      Parameters:
      username - The username for which the user ID is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The ID of the user, or 0 if the user is not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error during the SQL query execution.
